alert.note: Alert for Butler; Carter; Ripley; Wayne (Missouri) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Paducah (Southern Illinois and Indiana, Southeastern Missouri and Western Kentucky)
info.headline: Winter Storm Warning issued January 30 at 1:43PM CST until January 31 at 9:00AM CST by NWS Paducah
info.description: ...WINTER STORM WARNING IN EFFECT UNTIL 9 AM CST TUESDAY... * WHAT...Heavy mixed precipitation expected. Total sleet and snow accumulations of up to one inch and ice accumulations of a light glaze. * WHERE...In southeast Missouri, Wayne, Carter, Ripley and Butler Counties. * WHEN...From 3 PM this afternoon until 9 AM CST Tuesday. * IMPACTS...Plan on slippery road conditions. The hazardous conditions could impact the morning or evening commute. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...Heavy sleet, mixed at times with snow and freezing rain, will move into the Ozark Foothills after 3 PM this afternoon and continue through tonight before diminishing. Travel impacts will likely continue through the morning commute Tuesday.
info.instruction: If you must travel, keep an extra flashlight, food, and water in your vehicle in case of an emergency.
